I didn't play this until recently and it's been out forever. I'm sure you already know about it. Play it, it's awesome!

Um clássico do final dos anos 90, começo dos 2000.
Comparo-o facilmente ao cs 1.6, pelo fato de a unica diferença gritante que percebi ter sido a distancia das granadas lançadas.
Um jogo para a vida toda.

uno de los juegos mas competitivos que conozco, estrategia, pensar rapido y prevenir. Eterno el cs, mi juego favorito

Honestly I like the game, but there is a thing that annoys me. I'm not the best player at all but the Anti-Cheat of this game just doesn't work. I know there smurfs or players using they're secondary account but the quantity of cheaters is just unbalievable.

Es el juego al que mas horas le he dedicado en toda mi vida, pero desde que lo hicieron Free to Play hay mucha gente toxica y mucho manco... RECOMIENDO el juego, pero es necesario jugar con otros 4 amigos...
Jugue una partida luego de mucho tiempo sin jugar y me ban era; VIVA CHILEEEE
não tem oque reclamar, simplesmente excelente!!!!!!

Great game! All around amazing quality and almost zero bugs at all!
The trading system and in game items like skins, cases, and sprays keep the game interesting! Competetive and Casual players can have fun all the time..

The community can be toxic some times... but most of the time you are paired with cool people. Racism is common so is vulgar language..

The only thing I would say is be careful and watch how you react to people's comments... 

All in all.. the game is fun! <3

Un juego bastante competitivo y entretenido, hay pocos bugs, los servidores bastante estables. 
Quienes digan que los servidores son una verga, es cuestión de acostumbrarse o simplemente son muy exigentes con las expectativas que tienen de otros shooters

after 550 hours, i would say this game blows fat cock. making it free to play was a goddamn abortion center dumpster fire of an idea. i wish i could reclaim all the time i put into this game and instead play it with hacks, it probably wouldve been a more coherent experience. i would rate this a FUCKYOUVALVE/10.

Too many cheaters, even in Prime Matchmaking. The only reason I still play is because they're less common because of my trust factor. New accounts or new to CSGO will experience the WORST CS ever. Do not pay for PRIME, it's a rip off.
